scripts.uglify: cat app/scripts/jquery-1.11.0.min.js app/scripts/angular.min.js app/scripts/angular-route.min.js app/scripts/angular-resource.min.js app/scripts/angular-animate.min.js app/scripts/ui-bootstrap-tpls.min.js app/scripts/bootstrap.min.js app/scripts/shots.js app/scripts/details.js app/scripts/dribbble.js  app/scripts/app.js | uglifyjs -o app/dist/bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run uglify && cp node_modules/sw-toolbox/sw-toolbox.js app/sw-toolbox.js && npm run precache
